Name: California Root Beer
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Review: Does indeed taste like root beer.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Mark Torre's 1984 The Bartender's Cherry, Second Edition .
Nutrition: One serving of California Root Beer contains 185 calories
